snippet: Why are some millennials electing to “spread themselves thin” professionally?
abstract: Why are some millennials electing to “spread themselves thin” professionally?
lead_paragraph: In “The Lives of Millennial Career Jugglers,” Sheila Marikar writes about young people who are members of the “slash generation.”

headline.main: 6 Q’s About the News | The Lives of Millennial Career Jugglers
